Articles.Content:
Long time lurker, just made an account. nuff said.

So anyway, this challenge has to do with flying different jumpy things to different places and pulling off stunts. In a rover. Of your making.

you have to build a jump, first, and land it on Minmus. bring a rover over htere, and take some screenshots of your jumps.

DIFFICULTIES

n00b: just take the rover and jump and do it. 5 pts.

All the ones below require having a kerbal on the rover to count:

Getting Started: add some nitro(engines) to your rover. 10 pts.

standard grunt: acheive a suborbital trajectory that takes you at least 90 degrees around the planet using your nitro. 25 pts.

Orbiter 101: orbit. with nitro. 75 pts.

hardcore:do all of the above, except on the mun. 200 pts.

MANLEY MODE: do n00b-grunt levels on Dres. 1337 points.

Godmode: do n00b-grunt levels on Eeloo. 9001 points.

BONUS POINTS

Stuntman: do a backflip, flat spin, or barrel roll mid-jump -5pts.

Performer: get some of your Kerbal friends to watch you -5pts.

Perfect Dive: land without exploding -5pts.

NITROOOOOO: add some engines and fuel to make your rover go faster

MOAR NITROOOOOO: use an engine bigger than an LVT-T30 for your nitro. 20pts.

Combo: do two or more jumps in a row- 30pts

Superman: Do an EVA while in midair and return before you land. -50pts

Rules

Sscreenshots are nice, but if they're large put them in spoilers.

I won't be keeping a scoreboard, but there may be honourable mention in the hall of explodiness.

feel free to post a craft file for your rover or jump.

YOU CAN HYPEREDIT THE JUMP TO THE LOCATION, BUT IF YOU DO PLEASE TELL US AND SUBTRACT 1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000 FROM YOUR SCORE.

I feel like putting giant wheels on an orange tank and skipper after landing it on Eeloo. Maybe even give it a mothership and go for Minmus, the Mun, Dres, and Eeloo! Also, there is nothing that prohibits me from getting an orbital jump and doing all of the stunts.

i know.

it's just a fun little thing.
